divs: Sighting Detailsok. im on my way home from working a 13 hour day. driving south on coldwater rd in fort wayne. as i cross the bridge that crosses i 69. i was looking at spot lights coming from pieres (a dance club) i noticed a object in the sky that i can not explian, at first i tryed to explain it to myself that it was kids letting a ballon go,and had attached something to it that made it glow orange, as i pull up to light at st joe and coldwater rd. and watched the object while i was stopped @ the red light. it moved sporatecly and did not seem to get any smaller or any less bright,. it looked like it would stop on a dime and then move fast then change directions. as the stop light turned green i tryed to keep my eyes on the object while trying not to wreck my car. i kept my eyes bouncing back up to the dark sky hoping to understand what i was seeing. i watched the object for another few moments . i looked back at the road,then looked up and it was gone???? i pulled off st joe and hoped out of my car. and looked long and hard up into the night sky hopeing to see something that would help explain what i seen, i was confused, and excited...
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
